mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Colorado Parks & Wildlife - Species Data - Black-footed Ferret Release Sites

mods:name.mods:namePart: CPW, USFWS, BLM, Fort Collins Natural Areas

mods:physicalDescription.mods:note: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

mods:mods.mods:abstract:
This is part of the Natural Diversity Information Source, which provides information on wildlife distributions to public and private agencies and individuals, for environmental assessment, proprietary land management resource planning and general scientific reference.This is part of the Natural Diversity Information Source, which provides information on wildlife distributions to public and private agencies and individuals, for environmental assessment, proprietary land management resource planning and general scientific reference.None

Data in this feature class is variable over both time and over the landscape. It represents the best available data at this time. As new information becomes available, these data will be modified and new maps will be created. This data is a product and property of Colorado Parks and Wildlife, a division of the Colorado Department of Natural Resources. Care should be taken in interpreting these data. Written documents (maps) may accompany this dataset and should be referenced. The Colorado Department of Natural Resources is not responsible and shall not be liable to the user for damages of any kind arising out of the use of data or information provided by the Department, including the installation of the data or information, its use, or the results obtained from its use. ANY DATA OR INFORMATION PROVIDED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF NATURAL RESOURCES IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. Data or information provided by the Department of Natural Resources shall be used and relied upon only at the user's sole risk, and the user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Department of Natural Resources, its officials, officers and employees from any liability arising out of the use of the data or information provided.
